text:
Liga
Bar√ßa: Alba, the new tile for Valverde
Inundated in a critical situation, club blaugrana will have to do without the services of Jordi Alba, who relapsed last night against Slavia Prague.
06 Nov 2019, 09:20 by Thomas Rassouli



The Blaugrana can not do it. Once again last night, Bar√ßa stalled at home against Slavia Prague in the Champions League. Faced with this opponent considered more modest in this group of C1, the Catalans were neutralized, failing to find the flaw. Antoine Griezmann and Ousmane Demb√©l√© were again at the heart of the debate, not meeting the expectations of fans.
As for Ernesto Valverde, the coach is more than ever in turmoil, and is obliged to obtain results as soon as possible to start a new dynamic.




Absent several weeks




Ernesto Valverde + 11 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Only if the coach has since this weekend had to compose without one of its holders in the person of Luis Suarez, another member of the eleven-type will be away from the lawn for a few weeks. As announced by the club last night, Jordi Alba has a relapse, and is suffering again from a muscle injury.
